i strongly recommend this game i gave xcom a few tries over the years and this happened to be the year where everything clicked in my brain the biggest piece of advice for new players is to save scum if the game didnt want you to reload saves it will put on iron man mode by default   it also ran great on my steam deck it crashed a few times when i played with the enemy within dlc but it stopped after i went to compatibility settings and change the compatibility layer to proton 706
